feed.title: Lidarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.6.4.4402
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 0e9a5fbd04a605ff1d639c32ba3936b1cc1a3fdc Automated API Docs update
  • f3cd49a2dadd4028f0643e5e3e5082efea2277f8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1a74118d6bf4264ee81455872fd46adcec589ce4 New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base
  • 9850823298ea49fa2373ef0917cde43121a3ff6f Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON
  • bd7d25f963b27153655bf5ea1258e02c78bc440e Fixed: Sorting by title and release dates in Select Album modal [ #5145, #5125 ]
  • 3a5012655e94d5cc927c3be3dd82ee0661c50325 Bump macOS runner version to 13
  • ba55a4778aa86e66cf94ade8280ffcaa71b20729 Bump version to 2.6.4
  • ff91589f735ecf093dd201202b5fcbf0af3d4c52 Automated API Docs update
  • 2caba01123d7585817c32b190365d2f85d7e8366 Fix tests for nested artist folders
  • 4588bc4a7e9809cfa735068128020a6e19588a6d Fixed: Manual importing to nested artist folders
See More * 3381ffc311f10029d387b84ee356390b682f0bcb New: Last Searched column on Wanted screens (#5084) * f705603211d6ddbf9a4eb430844644db06c792d8 Updated .gitignore to remove duplications and add '_temp*' (#5142) * 715274bcc7d489346faafc4cbb89d64a1151bffe Improve indexer name for RED * 9b063aa291a698b6f1eed620ba9ad27cb8e2159b Bump version to 2.6.3 * af4ff004768800440de3c06af8aa7bd2b1f4cdcd Fixed: Telegram log message including token * b14c647c86b3276ee44b82309f227d4328559572 Display naming example errors when all fields are empty * 00cca22dc7957a6475331836e6e0f31ae6616b50 Fixed: Adding individual albums for existing artists * 73fddd5201c6bf7e8663a950800debc91040c2f3 Update license reference * b7e5a745a1e4e9279a302f4bac7176d3af1a7376 Bump version to 2.6.2 * b67533bccff38bed0a138a55e10732ce9750193b Automated API Docs update * 21d9ecccd6a409fad8881fe81d75f9e5f1ddd100 Fixed: Improve validation for individual album adding * 34c9300cbf8958a4dc56143775324a88aa56104b Fix description for API key as query parameter * 3e5af06622bf84e543374cbc3a1fe2547b5f8d94 Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets * ccce4f5cc0d43888c28fc771dba6febfff05bba4 New: Show warning in queue if download contains executable or archive file and no audio file was detected (#5106) * 5947b4642c65f7541d8e808254440e645cd8392d New: Check for available space before grabbing [ #5095 ] * 856ac2ffa5344b9d2fb0f54a12abf935b8bad9ca New: Add exception to SSL Certificate validation message [ #5103 ] * b2a4c75cce80ad763d691d04bd8d47b0e59ab753 Fixed: Refresh tags after updating autotags [ #5093 ] * 2818f4e0732edeef63cd271875a88e663194fbef New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name [ #5102 ] * 60fe75877b7d0e5b554a9957a64117c934788443 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 2170ada8a2db9595834c559abb97cc574c823892 Fixed: Linking autotags with tag specification to all tags * secondary types on album details * 21344361e4964d79db04d7a29762051cf5134941 Add weblate widget * 8efb6025310152291ddd73ce3945994aa0df512b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.7.1.4417
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • cb6608975e3778d4e753592a11edd9232bea1e59 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2db04a3452cc0aa2cbe4b5c5b738955988d6a73e Rename unused CancelMessageText
  • 5cead5f7ffb741ee25aed14e4bee44042ee13e62 Bump version to 2.7.1
  • 850c08dda34b57d4fedb9138617a4ff378fe455c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • f005695b4872d7efbae6890526df7fe3d5e26c1d Skip spotify mapping tests
  • 55626594c59c9a3fefa53d738f2a6ee68342cff2 New: Allow major version updates to be installed
  • c645afc389e9901ed02018d012fa48a481a9e792 Bump frontend packages
  • 33d61698820a2840503c97232b672ab6ea991d12 Bump dotnet to 6.0.35
  • c750f4764f0422a05dce21133f954813f696a300 Sync OsInfo with upstream (#5163)
  • c6c52c4117217379df4396ff8d35d24d76cc2547 Bump version to 2.7.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.8.2.4493
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • ad084cdf917d1f84d967be01b09891fe5d19653b Fixed: Parse FLAC 24-bit/24_bit/24.bit as FLAC 24bit
  • 4bcdc49777c21808389dcf70127a4ccb7b5dd008 Fixed: Refresh backup list on deletion

unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check * beabad5e3a07155641c55637314be0154400ab86 Fixed: Updated Base Url for Redacted (#5250) * 2b1684a793b37dfc741b4b61e781de6166bf84d6 Webpack web target * entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.9.6.4552
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 8e01ba5f21033f601fdfdcbf86ca798a295c0179 Bump version to 2.9.6
  • 45e8ecffa07844f4d064dd59eb32f04d16cbf87f Fixed: Ignore special folders inside Blackhole watch folders
  • 3c4b438d2797417471be19b9d652717c88370c22 Fixed: Health warning for downloading inside root folders [ #5384 ]
  • 8fd79d729147ff99ff7b9699059c0c6636218936 New: Prefer newer Usenet releases
  • 477a799b8a15c56600a33ecd4940d140ab08195e Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 51a38bc648ed1b2d703de8fc37758e3eb4b3ac6b Fix logging message for directory watcher error
  • 917f7056952055631a35b41445d29f2ae26ac3ed Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 5a1092b5112960846f1081f5070b1ea2cc5e9f23 Prevent page crash on console.error being used with non-string values
  • ef2c6366c47d8f37639324e1daefa4e038a7db52 New: reflink support for ZFS [ #5369 ]
  • 1ffb82e3648bc3e819065f6f92ccb74562b617b7 Bump version to 2.9.5

Listening on all IPv4 Addresses * 7cfcf01ae3171eef6ef9df94092cb2a06b770cc1 Fixed: qBittorrent Ratio Limit Check * 17c5c66e549a16ede12c826c7c17a73b31c02a90 Bump version to 2.9.3 * entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.10.3.4602
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 81895f803387492da728a15fbfffdbb9d3b5025b Fixed: Drop downs flickering in some cases [ #5386 ]
  • a1c2bfa527111c78aef174dadb381524166ee263 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

blocking the correct Torrent Info Hash [ #4977, #4988 ] * 9fc549b43bc5076fa8e500134440ffd114c8a899 Fixed: Replace diacritics in Clean Title naming tokens * a2201001c514d07da01c63fcb88e912411a30de4 for webhooks when Artist Metadata is not set [ #5368 ] * 860bd04c5986013862ffea0cf10d31d72069208a New: Add artist tags to Webhook and Notifiarr events [ #4805 ] *
